regexCodeList.string: As you arrive, you trip over your own feet and fall on your face.
As you try to move, you manage to trip over your own legs and promptly fall on your face.
You drop to one knee, demonstrating your humility and respect.
Your mind is whirling with thoughts - you cannot settle down to sleep.
You yell, "I like cheese!"
^You yell, "\w+ (?:smells like a goat|is cute)!"$
You cannot kneel while you are on the floor!
Spiders are erupting from your mouth and nose!
You are stunned by the sight of a massive pink bunny hopping by.
You are stunned by a vision of divine astral beings.
Your mind is too disrupted for transplanar travel.
You are too confused to concentrate properly.
The idea of putting something in your stomach sickens you.
Your limbs begin to jerk and shake uncontrollably, and you begin to foam at the mouth.
Hatred burns in your eyes - you realise that your enemies are everywhere!
An ally is just someone pretending to like you, to make all the sweeter when they stab you in the back! Allies are for weaklings - you have no allies!
You are feeling far too passive to do that.
You stand in such dishonour that not even your loyal friends will help you.
^You see the mouth of .+ moving as if in speech, though you hear nothing\.$
The salve slides off your oily skin.
^You watch helplessly as your lifeforce drains into \w+\.$
You hear an ominous sound, and a dull pain stab throbs throughout your head.
You hear strange whispers, and a sharp pain stabs you between the eyes.
You hear a dark thrumming, and pain wracks your entire being.
Your limbs twitch of their own volition under the curse of the jinx, refusing to obey your commands.
You move sluggishly into action.
You are paralysed and cannot do that.
Your blood refuses to clot.
You have a particularly intense shiver.
You begin moving your frozen body slowly
You cannot contain the convulsions in your stomach any longer and double over, retching violently.
Your bowels turn to water and are voided as you double over from a sharp pain in your stomach.
You gasp and shiver as you feel yourself losing control of your own power.
You swoon as you suffer a toxic relapse.
You are blind and can see nothing but darkness.
Ugly sores break open upon your skin, seeping with a bloody yellow mucus.
Your lungs are much too constricted to smoke.
A sudden itch drives you half-mad, and you scratch it furiously.
Flames lick around you - you are on fire!
A wave of pain radiating from your crushed chest robs you of focus.
Your crushed chest increases your sensitivity to bruises.
The bleeding in your gut seems to flow faster.
Your throat is too damaged to swallow.
Your inability to breathe leads to a hypoxia-induced blackout.
Tight bindings prevent you from moving.
Tight bindings cling to you, making that impossible.
^Your health continues to drain away as your impaled body shudders on the end of \w+'s antlers\.$

Trigger.name: Impaled
Trigger.script: if not laff.affs.gored or laff.affs.crucified then laff.symptom("impaled") end

regexCodeList.string: You are impaled, which makes movement impossible.
You are impaled and must writhe off before you may do that.
^You are grappled by \w+\. You must writhe to escape\.$
You are transfixed and cannot move.
You are transfixed and cannot do that. You must writhe to escape.
^The mutt hanging off your (left|right) arm keeps you from moving\.$
^You almost lose your balance as .+ viciously shakes your (left|right) arm, tearing your flesh and causing massive bleeding\.$
A silver light weighs upon you, draining your mental energies.
You are too stunned to be able to do anything.
A wafer of purity dust turns to ash in your mouth, and you spit it out.
Your bent aura causes a new affliction to manifest.
Glowing lights swirl around you in a slow, graceful dance of hypnotic patterns, disrupting your concentration.
Blood drips from your nose as the rainbow lights swirl around you in a maddening frenzy.
^You feel the Mark of (Despair|Corruption|Darkness|Pain|Damnation) claw at your soul\.$
You suddenly relive events that happened just moments ago.
The time looping around you spins faster and faster before imploding in on you. You find yourself reliving moments that just passed again.
You rush about in a state of utter panic.
You are asleep and can do nothing. WAKE will attempt to wake you.
You must first stand up before you can do that.
A puddle of slimy mucus forms under your feet, causing you to slip and fall.
You are:
covered in sticky mud.
suffering from the effects of blank note.
attracted to (\w+)\.$
suffering from a dazzling afterimage.
^You have \d+ afflictions\.$
A dazzling orange afterimage burns into your sight.
Dazzling lights flash across your vision, leaving you with naught but a fading orange afterimage.
The dazzling afterimage fades from your vision.
The mud covering you slows your movement.
You are caught in the onslaught and go down in a wave of rolling mud.
Warm water showers down upon yourself, and you scrub under your armpits trying to wash away that awful mud caked all over your body.
The rains sluice across your body, washing off the caked mud covering you.
^The Mark of (Despair|Corruption|Darkness|Pain|Damnation) fades away as the laughter of (\w+) echoes eerily in your mind\.$
ou cry out as your deaf ears open up to the sound of a high-pitched note\.$
The ache in your ear canals suddenly intensifies, leaving you with nothing but a splitting headache.
^The lyrical sound invokes a strange longing for (\w+)\.$
The ache in your ear canals clears up.
^The lyrical sound invokes a strange longing for (\w+)\.$
^You find you cannot bear to part from (\w+)\.$
^You lose your attraction to (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Princess farewell
Trigger.script: laff.symptom("echoes") --note: as this blacks out too, you don't get gmcp message unless under the effects of blacktea, requiring

regexCodeList.string: Filled with a haunting sorrow and unlimited love, an excruciatingly beautiful note brings tears to your eyes and a lump to your throat. Time slows and momentarily a vision fills your eyes of a goddess floating over an ancient pool with tears streaming down her face.
^You have cured (\w+)\.$

Script.name: Lafftrak functions!
Script.script:
laff = laff or {} laff.affs = laff.affs or {} local addHandler, removeHandler, listHandler local oldaffs = oldaffs or {} local stamps = stamps or {} laff.debug = laff.debug or false
local function stamp(affliction) stamps[affliction] = os.clock() end
function laff.printStamp(affliction) cecho( " <ansi_032>(<ansi_073>" .. (math.floor((os.clock() - stamps[affliction]) * 100) / 100) .. "<ansi_032>)" ) stamps[affliction] = nil end
function laff.echo(text) if laff.debug then cecho("\n<coral>[<firebrick>LaffTrak<coral>]<MediumSlateBlue>: <PowderBlue>" .. text) end end
function laff.add() local affliction = gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Add.name laff.echo(affliction .. " added by gmcp.") laff.affs[affliction] = true stamp(affliction) end
if addHandler then killAnonymousEventHandler(addHandler) end addHandler = registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Add", "laff.add")
function laff.remove() for _, affliction in pairs(gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Remove) do laff.echo(affliction .. " removed by gmcp.") laff.affs[affliction] = nil end end
if removeHandler then killAnonymousEventHandler(removeHandler) end removeHandler = registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Remove", "laff.remove")
function laff.list() oldaffs = laff.affs laff.affs = {} for _, affliction in pairs(gmcp.Char.Afflictions.List) do laff.affs[affliction.name] = true end end
if listHandler then killAnonymousEventHandler(listHandler) end listHandler = registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.Char.Afflictions.List", "laff.list")
function laff.diagAff(affliction) laff.affs[affliction] = true end
function laff.diagEnd() --check for afflictions we just discovered for affliction, _ in pairs(laff.affs) do if not oldaffs[affliction] then laff.echo(affliction .. " added by diagnose.") stamp(affliction) end end --check for afflictions we used to have but don't anymore. for affliction, _ in pairs(oldaffs) do if not laff.affs[affliction] then laff.echo(affliction .. " removed by diagnose.") end end end
function laff.symptom(affliction) if not laff.affs[affliction] then laff.echo(affliction .. " added by symptom.") laff.affs[affliction] = true stamp(affliction) end end
function laff.cured(affliction) if laff.affs[affliction] then laff.echo(affliction .. " cured by trigger.") laff.affs[affliction] = nil end end
function laff.recklessCheck() local vitals = gmcp.Char.Vitals if vitals.ego == vitals.maxego and vitals.mp == vitals.maxmp and vitals.hp == vitals.maxhp and vitals.pow == "10" then laff.affs.recklessness = true laff.echo("Reckless check - added recklessness") else laff.affs.recklessness = nil laff.echo("Reckless check - removed recklessness") end end
function displayaffs() display(laff.affs) display(oldaffs) display(stamps) end
